textBox.richText: Gunter came in last night, and Max had class, so Alli, Gunter and I played around. They just opened pioneer yesterday, so even though there hasn’t been snow for a little while, I still brought out the S7s, as I figured the Buckaroo trees would be glorious. I was right. :) Alli brought out the downhills...I had forgotten how much faster she was on those. Got some great shots of her turns in the vid below. We did meet up with Max for lunch. He was very excited, as they got first tracks down Short Haul, and hucked some of the rocks. Dangerous!!!
